name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Full Stack Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building scalable and secure web applications. Proficient in **Python**, **TypeScript**, and integrating **APIs** for high-performance B2B SaaS solutions. Expertise in **Web Applications** development with a focus on **Customizations**, ensuring compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS for security and performance.
Skilled in creating integrations that drive fault tolerance and scalability within applications. Strong communicator and collaborator, adept at problem-solving to enhance development processes. Well-versed in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and **Node.js** for frontend solutions, alongside **FastAPI** and **Django** for backend services. Experienced in leveraging **AWS** and **Azure** for deploying cloud-native systems, employing microservices and CI/CD pipelines to streamline development workflows. Committed to driving innovation in HR Tech and enhancing user experience through advanced technology.
